headline: Business Transformation Leader. Industrial Engineer. MBA.
about:
I am an Industrial Engineer and MBA specialised in strategic and management consulting, leading digital transformation and process re-engineering projects for various industries.

With 10+ years as a team leader, I have learned that work becomes relevant when it revolves around people and success is only sustainable by empowering people along the way.

Passionate about digital transformation and the necessary cultural change. I feel motivated by solving problems in challenging environments and in direct contact with clients.

Main fields of expertise: Management, Management Consulting, Digital Transformation, Business Strategy and Development, Service delivery, People Performance, Project Management, Process Eficiency and Innovation.

experience.description:
- Supervise the Bosonit team for BAU operations as part of the Santander COE Big Data project.
- Act as the SPOC for service level management metrics and reporting.
- Coordinate and facilitate SOX Audits on the Data Lake, ensuring compliance and effective issue resolution.
- Develop and maintain internal COE metrics for performance tracking and operational efficiency.

- Develop the Lean Transformation Plan (Projects in Transformation, KPIs’ targets, Personnel skills, Suppliers Involvement).
- Coordinate Kaizen Events and in general Lean Transformation to improve the operational model, eliminate waste and increase value, efficiency, and quality.
- Work with Operations to correct and improve ongoing team management: recruitment requirements, objectives setting, performance, efficiency gain, and training.
- Work with BI to correct and improve ongoing data strategy to facilitate data collection, processing, and visualization.
- Coach Project Team on Lean Approach to maximize KPIs and Contract Requirements achievement.
- Professional services as a Process and Efficiency expert.

experience.location: Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description:
- Supervision of IT transformation projects portfolio. Design,
implementation and governance of Agile methodology. (Healthcare Industry)
- Redesign of high-level management and operational models. Evaluation of
the functional weaknesses of the systems used to feed the Product Backlog.
BPM with focus on improving the performance of internal users and suppliers
(Payment Card Industry - Issuance)
- Re-design of the Banks' requirements management process. (Payment Processing Provider – Retail Acquisition)
- Responsible for the process modeling, user interface design, testing and change management teams in a project to implement an project management system for R&D initiatives. (Manufacturing industry)
- Functional and process analysis in Core Banking implementations in order to improve the internal and external user experience and improve end-to-end efficiency. (Banking & Mutual Funds)

- Management and execution of process optimization programs.  KPI’s design.
- Quality control and project progress reporting. 
(Banking)

- Design and execution of ERP and MRP implementations. Evaluation of organizational changes through EBITDA evolution. 
- LEAN and BPM methodologies applied to process flow optimization. Design of logistic table. 
(Retail, Textile and Furniture).

- Planning and implementation of the Quality Management System.
- Management of multidisciplinary improvement initiatives.
- Design of the company's balanced scorecard.

- Management of daily operations and user support.
- Functional analysis of customer reqs. Component and End-to-End Testing. 
- Extracting DB results and customizing reports for Clients and Regulators.

education.degree: Diplomatura en Lean Six Sigma (Green Belt)
Posgrado en Sistemas Integrados de Gestión (ISO9001-ISO14001-OHSAS18001)

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Socio en Paradigma
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: December 20, 2020, Carlos managed Andres directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Andrés tiene una sólida experiencia en consultoría de Management, Procesos e Implementación de Sistemas. Es una persona orientada a resultados, con excelentes capacidades de liderazgo y de gestión de equipos de trabajo multidisciplinarios. Posee un enfoque holístico que le permite gestionar proyectos con excelentes resultados. Su capacidad de gestión de negocios resulta clave a la hora de interactuar con clientes de diferentes industrias. Excelente persona y profesioal.

about:
Estudiante universitaria con grandes aptitudes para trabajar en equipo, así como para aportar creatividad. Soy una persona muy resolutiva, y con capacidades para resolver problemas. 

Considero que es importante no dejar de aprender y mantenerse al día acerca de las nuevas tendencias del mercado, ya que es la base de cualquier negocio. Soy apasionada de la moda y del diseño.

headline: COO@Seedify | Co-Founder@DFM
about:
I’m an experienced leader and builder at the intersection of blockchain and traditional finance. As Co-Founder of DeFi Markets and Chief Operating Officer at Seedify, I combine strategic execution with a deep understanding of market dynamics to scale Web3 ecosystems from the ground up.

My career is defined by operational excellence and forward-thinking leadership. My vision is to bridge institutional standards with decentralization, driving sustainable growth, transparency, and innovation across the DeFi space.

experience.description: Building a Permissionless DTF Launchpad for Internet Capital Markets

Lead Generator.
Project Acquisition and Onboarding Specialist. 
Account Manager. Communication specialist.
Qualify and evaluate applicants which can potentially be further enrolled in the incubation and launchpad stage. Assist in the formulation of business ideas and pitch decks.
Provide continued strategic guidance to entrepreneurs in business modeling, sales, marketing, fundraising, overall strategy, operations, etc.

Account Manager. B2B, B2C.
Financial Advisor (Stock Market, Loans, Bonds, Debt, and Equity).
Blockchain Advisor (Crypto, DeFi, NFT, Launchpads ICO, IEO, IDO).
Coordinate department heads. Monthly and annual reports.

Perform strategic data work in support of Product Managers. Market research.
Explain trends across data sources, and potential opportunities for growth or improvement.
Generate invoices and account reconciliations. Stock management.

experience.companyName: Fenix Bursatil Sociedad de Bolsa S.A
experience.description:
Account Executive. Client support. B2B, B2C.  
Financial Advisor. (Stock Market, Loans, Bonds).
Treasury Assistant. Exchange and settlement operation. Cash-Flow.

education.description:
Blockchain technology.
Public Blockchain. Permission Blockchain. 
Crypto economy and tokenization.
Dapps. DAOs. 
Smart Contracts. IoT. Web3.0. 
Regulations and legal aspects.
Design and project planning.

Innovation in business models.
Lean Start-up. Fundamentals and Strategy.
Entrepreneurship. Leadership.
Accounting and Finance.
Digital Marketing. 
SEO. Social Media.
Ads. Growth Hacking.

Marketing. Management. 
E-business. Accounting.
Trade and international business. 
Organisational process and design.

receivedRecommendations.givenAt: December 6, 2022, Olusegun Joel worked with Agustin on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Agustin is not only hard-working, but also extremely dedicated, highly skilled, and delivers efficiently. His knowledge of gamefi, Defi, and general blockchain projects is impeccable. Additionally, his ability to stay motivated under pressure is incredible. Agustin is a team player and a motivator. Love working with this incredible talent.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Business Development | Partnerships
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 29, 2022, Kavin worked with Agustin on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Agustin is a dedicated, hard-working, and qualified professional who has demonstrated an aptitude to successfully exceed the expectations of his role. He is driven and achieves results in an efficient manner. His ability to communicate effectively with composure is clinical. I highly recommend Agustin to any employer and I'm confident he will achieve success on whichever path he embarks on.

headline: Trading Officer
about: Profesional con más de 15 años de experiencia en logística, atención al cliente y gestión operativa en entornos multinacionales. Líder de equipos multidisciplinarios, con sólida trayectoria en la optimización de procesos, gestión KPI's, cumplimiento de SLA's y coordinación de delegaciones nacionales e internacionales. Alta capacidad analítica, enfoque en resultados y orientación a la mejora continua. Experiencia comprobada en implementación de sistemas CRM y colaboración transversal con áreas técnicas, comerciales y administrativas.

profileTopEducation.schoolName: UCES - Universidad de Ciencias Empresariales y Sociales

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España

experience.description:
- Gestionar el funcionamiento de la planificación de los equipos de producción y equipos de ingeniería. (40 equipos producción / 3 equipos ingeniería)
- Tramites con las distintas administraciones para las instalaciones de placas fotovoltaicas, aerotermia, permisos de ocupación de vía pública, etc.
- Flota de vehículos (negociación con proveedores)
- Seguimiento de KPI’s
- Gestión de incidencias con los clientes.
- Interacción con delegaciones del exterior (UK, Italia, Francia, Alemania).

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
- Diseño y ejecución de campañas de ventas estratégicas en centros comerciales.
- Coordinación logística, montaje y funcionamiento de los stands de la marca.
- Supervisión, entrenamiento y apoyo del equipo de vendedores.
- Reporte de métricas de ventas y rendimiento del área comercial.
- Monitoreo del cumplimiento de los lineamientos de imagen, seguridad y calidad.

experience.position: Analista de logística de abastecimiento de las plantas de Argentina y Chile
experience.description:
- Monitoreo y coordinación del servicio de abastecimiento a Plantas propias (6 plantas) y de terceros proveedores (más de 10) de Argentina y Chile.
- Integración a nuevos sistemas de gestión y rastreo, Track and Trace de vehículos.
- Supervisión y Mejora continua en los procesos de gestión dentro las operaciones.
- Seguimiento de KPIs de servicio y proyectos de saving.
- Reuniones diarias con los equipos de planificación de logística, tanto de Brasil, Argentina y Chile.
- Reuniones periódicas con las Plantas para darle seguimientos a proyectos de mejora continua, Saving, KPIs, etc.

- Optimización del proceso de pedidos de clientes (Fill rate y lead time) y supervisión para la mejora continua del mismo.
- Detección de oportunidades de mejora en los procesos de atención al cliente e interactuando con las distintas interfaces involucradas de la compañía. 
- Liderar proyectos de eficiencias logísticas, mejorando el lead time e indicadores de costos.
- Reuniones periódicas con clientes, siendo el nexo entre el Dpto. Comercial y Dpto. Logística.
- Búsqueda continua de mejoras en los procesos, para optimizar la logística y mejorar la experiencia del cliente.

- Medición, control y mejora de indicadores de servicio al cliente.
- Informes para el directorio. 
- Pilares de mejora de procesos. 
- Diseño de herramientas para automatizar procesos. 
- Soporte y capacitación a otras áreas.

- Análisis de stocks, lanzamiento de ventas de nuevos productos, promociones y packs. 
- Armado y coordinación de cargas terrestres, marítimas y aéreas. 
- Alocación del stock y facturación. 
- Proyectos de exportaciones a nuevos mercados.

•	Coordinación de Fletes internacionales, marítimos, terrestres y aéreos. 
•	Seguimiento de órdenes de compra y cargas proyecto.
•	Constante comunicación con clientes y proveedores locales e internacionales.
•	Comunicación continua con Compañías marítimas y aéreas para la coordinación logística y supervisión documental
•	Operativa en aduanas de Argentina e internacionales.

•	Operativa de envíos y recepción de muestras al exterior.
•	Rastreo y reembarco de muestras extraviadas, averiadas o destruidas. Manejo de despachos de importación y exportación por Sistema Simplificado. Confección de AWB. Constante comunicación con todas las oficinas de DHL en el mundo.

•	Operativa en aduanas de Argentina e internacionales.

•	Operativa de envíos y recepción de muestras al exterior.
•	Rastreo y reembarco de muestras extraviadas, averiadas o destruidas. Manejo de despachos de importación y exportación por Sistema Simplificado. Confección de AWB. Constante comunicación con todas las oficinas de DHL en el mundo.

headline: Software Factory Argentina with office in Valencia, Spain
about:
Desde 1993 nos desempeñamos en el mercado informático en el área de desarrollo de software. Nuestras primeras experiencias fueron con VFP y VB, como analistas y programadores. Luego, por el 2001 comenzamos a trabajar con la plataforma .Net. Perfeccionamos nuestros conocimientos al respecto y con los años logramos convertirnos en arquitectos de software para sistemas bajo dicha plataforma.

A partir del 2012 comenzamos a incursionar en el mundo Java y desarrollos para Android. Creamos una nueva división de ITSouth especializada en este tipo de desarrollos (Quamove), formando un nuevo equipo de profesionales especialistas en estas tecnologías. 

Recientemente, abrimos una software factory en Valencia (España) y seguimos creciendo. 

Referencias: Grupo Sancor Seguros, Akapol, Molino Chacabuco, INTA, Pepsico, AGA, Structured Intelligence, Affinia, Ipsos, Cepas Arg., SBASE, Fund. Exportar Arg., Nación Seguros, Diario La Nación, ...

experience.position: Study Systems Consultant, specialized in computer consulting and software development
experience.description:
Vision: To be regional benchmarks in the implementation of new information technologies. 

Mission: Generate solutions (products and services) based on state-of-the-art computer technology. 

We are a Systems Consulting Firm that has been specializing in software development for years. This profile has allowed us to gain experience in several areas, and also guarantees our ability to adapt and understand different problems, without it becoming a barrier. 
To define our field of action a bit, we must start by saying that the characteristics of our service are extremely flexible, being able to start with the initial advice and the first feasibility studies (or feasibility) until the start-up and maintenance of the resulting application, Going through different stages, call these planning, analysis and design, project management, development and implementation, either with own resources or providing the necessary personnel to carry out the same. 
The company has its own infrastructure for the development of systems, composed of a stable staff of professionals with the appropriate building and technological equipment to face different kinds of developments.

skills.name: Análisis y diseño orientado a objetos

experience.location: Autonomous City of Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description:

headline: Sr. Product Designer | Product Manager | AI powered products
about:
Hola! Soy Nat, Product Designer & Product Manager.
Me considero una profesional curiosa, inquieta, participativa, con ganas de innovar y de poder aportar valor tanto a los proyectos como a quienes participan en ellos. Fundamentalista del feedback y del intercambio de conocimientos entre departamentos. Creo que el todo es más fuerte que las partes.
Como compañera de trabajo soy empática, honesta, con muchas ganas de ayudar, y siempre consciente que todos debemos aprender y que todos tenemos algo que enseñar.
topSkills: UI Design • Desarrollo de productos • Gestión de proyectos • Estrategia del producto • UX research

experience.description:
• Product Strategy & Ownership:
- Defined product vision, roadmap, and metrics from the ground up. 
- Created and prioritized the product backlog, with structured epics and user stories. 
- Designed and facilitated discovery workshops (mission/vision, tone of voice, user personas). 
- Conducted competitive benchmarking and user segmentation for strategic positioning. 
- Implemented impact/effort matrices and analytics to drive data-informed decision-making. 
- Actively collaborated with developers in agile sprints and daily stand-ups. 
- Developed the MVP and managed all launch phases, including the rollout of a Chrome Extension.

• Product Design & UX:
- Built the complete UX/UI experience: from wireframes and user flows to polished, high-fidelity designs.
- Created and maintained the design system and UI kit to ensure consistency and scalability. 
- Conducted usability tests and continuous feedback loops to iterate quickly. 
- Mentored and managed a junior UI designer, assigning tasks and guiding execution. 

• Cross-functional Collaboration 
- Acted as the connector between engineering, marketing, and leadership. 
- Partnered with marketing to shape messaging and go-to-market strategies. 
- Championed a people-first approach—collaborating with empathy, supporting colleagues, and building trust across teams.
skills: Administración del ciclo de vida de productos

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
- Experience in SaaS development, leading end-to-end product design processes. 
- Skilled in UX Research: defining user problems and identifying growth opportunities.
- Creation and management of Design Systems for scalable product consistency.
- Design of User Personas, Customer Journeys, User Flows, Wireframes, and Prototypes.
- Hands-on with ideation, prototyping, testing, and implementation cycles.
- Close collaboration with Product Managers and Developers in agile environments.
- Conducted usability tests and continuous feedback loops for fast iteration.
- Strong focus on QA, product documentation, and cross-functional alignment.

- Banner design.
- Userflows / Wireflows
- User research / User persona profile.
- Information architecture.
- Contact with stakeholders.
- Presentations.
- Holistic view of projects.
-UI Design.

- Brand design and communication.
- Art direction. In graphic campaigns and for RRSS
- Budgets, negotiation and definition of suppliers.
- Production and post-production of images and content.
- Control of delivery, execution and follow-up of the works and graphic pieces.
- Control and administration of RRSS (Facebook / Instagram), advertising, editorial.
- Monitoring and design of the stores, web, and other points of sale. 
- B2B / B2C.
- Packaging.
- Joint work with the Department of Clothing and Production.

Professor of  Graphic Design I y II - Night Shift.
Career: Production and Design of Videogames.
Taking theoretical and practical exams.
Preparation of practical work and evaluation of the general program.

Design, management of originals, control of suppliers, control of delivery and completion of work, customer service.
Workshop administration and control tasks.
Prepared of originals for printing, packaging, different techniques and small and large-scale printing supports.

projects.title: TravelApp
projects.description:
Native App Project for iOS.
Use of Design Systems, Agile Methods, Atomic Design, Wireframes, Prototyping.

projects.title: Redesign Proyect / Disney+
projects.description:
Redesign for the Disney+ app.
Use of Design Systems, Agile Methods, UX Canvas, Journey Maps, Taskflows, Wireflows, Prototyping.

projects.title: Rediseño de Marca
projects.description:
Re-diseño de Marca para un showroom de lencería. 
La marca necesitaba tener mas presencia y reconocimiento en las redes sociales. Asimismo actualizar el diseño ya existente para poder estar mas en sintonía con las tendencias del mercado.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Investigador en AI y Python developer | NLP ingeniería  | PhD en Física
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 17, 2025, Pablo worked with Natalia but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description: Natalia is a force of nature. I had the chance to experience how she expertly guides engineers as a great product manager, designing new features with great intuition and translating complex AI concepts and bringing into beautiful UI designs. Her comprehension of the business fundamentals is superb. She is great to collaborate with.

element.headline: Sr. Product Designer | Product Manager | AI powered products
element.about:
Hola! Soy Nat, Product Designer & Product Manager.
Me considero una profesional curiosa, inquieta, participativa, con ganas de innovar y de poder aportar valor tanto a los proyectos como a quienes participan en ellos. Fundamentalista del feedback y del intercambio de conocimientos entre departamentos. Creo que el todo es más fuerte que las partes.
Como compañera de trabajo soy empática, honesta, con muchas ganas de ayudar, y siempre consciente que todos debemos aprender y que todos tenemos algo que enseñar.
element.topSkills: UI Design • Desarrollo de productos • Gestión de proyectos • Estrategia del producto • UX research

experience.description:
• Product Strategy & Ownership:
- Defined product vision, roadmap, and metrics from the ground up. 
- Created and prioritized the product backlog, with structured epics and user stories. 
- Designed and facilitated discovery workshops (mission/vision, tone of voice, user personas). 
- Conducted competitive benchmarking and user segmentation for strategic positioning. 
- Implemented impact/effort matrices and analytics to drive data-informed decision-making. 
- Actively collaborated with developers in agile sprints and daily stand-ups. 
- Developed the MVP and managed all launch phases, including the rollout of a Chrome Extension.

• Product Design & UX:
- Built the complete UX/UI experience: from wireframes and user flows to polished, high-fidelity designs.
- Created and maintained the design system and UI kit to ensure consistency and scalability. 
- Conducted usability tests and continuous feedback loops to iterate quickly. 
- Mentored and managed a junior UI designer, assigning tasks and guiding execution. 

• Cross-functional Collaboration 
- Acted as the connector between engineering, marketing, and leadership. 
- Partnered with marketing to shape messaging and go-to-market strategies. 
- Championed a people-first approach—collaborating with empathy, supporting colleagues, and building trust across teams.

headline: PM 📊 | Controller & Reporting🔎 | Finance & Accounting 📉
about:
👩🏽‍💼 Cuento con una Maestría en Dirección de proyectos y una licenciatura en Ciencias Económicas. 
Por más de 10 años me he dedicado a mejorar procesos y procedimientos, para que lograr resultados eficientes. 
Mi capacidad de adaptación y flexibilidad ha quedado demostrada en mi desempeño en reconocidas organizaciones tanto en el ámbito público como en empresas multinacionales.
Me apasiona ❤️ escuchar, estudiar y analizar las metodologías que usan los equipos y creo que ante cada problema existe una posibilidad de mejorar.
He aprendido que para poder lograr resultados se necesitan muchas cosas, principalmente poder medir esos resultados, identificar qué medir, analizar los datos y valores de los indicadores y gestionar el accionar del equipo en pos de lo que queremos lograr.
Soy excelente controller por mi capacidad de análisis, de anticipación a problemas y mi foco puesto en la eficiencia.Además, poseo un nivel bilingüe de inglés, intermedio de francés y portugués. 
Soy geek del Excel y creo que los sistemas de gestión vienen solucionar el trabajo diario. Me declaro fan por aprender tanto del mundo formal como de las personas.  
Creo en el trabajo en equipo, no sólo como delegación de tareas sino como una estrategia para ser eficientes y disfrutar del proceso.

🇪🇸 Me mudé a Valencia para continuar mi desarrollo profesional.

experience.description:
Key Skills: 
Financial Reporting and Analysis
Strategic Planning, budgeting and Forecasting
Cash Flow Management
Consolidation of Accounts
Client and Supplier Operations Management

Main responsibilities: 
Prepare comprehensive periodic, monthly, quarterly, and annual reports to facilitate informed decision-making.

Conduct in-depth financial analysis to inform decision-making, identifying opportunities for cost optimisation and revenue enhancement.

Cultivate and maintain strong relations with banking entities, facilitating loan acquisition and managing contractual agreements.

Contribute to the annual budgeting process across different companies within the group, ensuring alignment with organisational objectives.

Prepare and compile documentation for the consolidation of accounts, ensuring accuracy and compliance with reporting standards.

Efficiently manage the daily operations involving clients and suppliers, ensuring seamless and productive collaborations.

Key Achievements:
Successfully led the redesign of the payment approval process, resulting in streamlined operations and increased efficiency.
Implemented improvements in monthly controlling reports, enhancing financial visibility for the entire group.
Established and maintained a strong internal control framework for AP, AR, taxation, and financial forecasting.

experience.companyName: Gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos aires
experience.description:
🌐 100% Remote Position
Experienced Strategic Operations Manager operating under the guidance and supervision of the esteemed Management and Strategy Division. Known for orchestrating seamless collaboration with key stakeholders across diverse divisions. Proficient in steering global strategies in alignment with organizational goals and overseeing intricate contractual lifecycles, acquisitions, and strategic agreements.

Employ a collaborative and inclusive approach to develop a global strategy aligned with the organization's overarching objectives.

Manage the end-to-end contract lifecycle, including acquisitions and the establishment of strategic or ad hoc agreements, ensuring meticulous adherence to contractual aspects.

Coordinate team activities, ensuring timely and high-quality project delivery. Provide guidance on strategy, plans, policies, and procedures for optimal results.

Design strategic planning frameworks and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for both short and long-term projects.

Ensure correct and accurate project handling, conduct follow-up meetings, and adhere to schedules. Oversee reporting, monitor KPIs, evaluate strategic projects, and administer budgets.

Lead, guide, and mentor team members organization -wide, promoting high professional and ethical standards.

🏆 Achievements:
Successfully led the payment process improvement project in 2021, achieving a remarkable 20% reduction in payment terms.
Instrumental in optimizing operating modes, reviewing and enhancing 67% of administration processes to date.

experience.companyName: Gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos aires
experience.description:
In my role as Director of Operations for the Ministry of Social Development, I orchestrated, designed, and supervised the simultaneous implementation of high-impact projects within a few months. Working collaboratively across five cross-functional teams, my focus was on standardizing, digitizing, and optimizing services for the 3,000,000 residents of the city.

Key Skills:

Project Management
Cross-Functional Collaboration
Process Optimization
Financial Operations
Quality Improvement
Stakeholder Engagement
Reporting and Analysis

Project Highlights:

IT Projects:
Led the implementation of a new enrollment software across 76 educational centers, catering to 60,000 vacancies.
Coordinated a software implementation project to streamline the management and monthly payment process for 15 food providers.

Processes and Procedures:
Developed comprehensive procedure manuals for financial operations spanning five business units.
Achieved budgetary and quality efficiency in the weekly food service order and delivery process for 468 locations.
Generated monthly reports to assess the structural conditions of over 500 different facilities.
Supervised the implementation of a subsidy payment administration system, achieving an 80% reduction in paper documentation volume.

Social Impact Evaluation:
Led the impact evaluation of social programs, partnering with UNICEF, for programs with a budget exceeding 3.8 billion. This resulted in the initiation of improvement processes, with leadership roles in two of them.

Project Authorization and Collaboration:
Drafted Technical Reference Documents (TRD) for the authorization of the "One Victory Leads to Another" project in collaboration with UN Women.

experience.companyName: Gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos aires
experience.description:
As a seasoned Senior Accountant, I bring a wealth of experience and a results-driven mindset to financial management. Proficient in handling complex financial transactions, optimizing budget execution, and ensuring regulatory compliance.  My strategic oversight enabled timely corrections, key decision-making, and successful project completion within approved timelines and budgets.


 Key Competencies:
Strategic Planning
Project Management
KPI Monitoring
Continuous Process Improvement
Budget Execution
Team Leadership

Strategic Planning:
Developed and executed the four-year strategic government plan (2016-2019) by selecting projects from various areas.
Identified project opportunities that formed the foundation for the 2019 Government Commitments Campaign.
Management Control:
Monitored KPIs for 30+ priority projects with social, urban development, and legal-banking impact.
Implemented continuous process improvement methodologies and coordinated cross-functional projects.
Achieved a 35% improvement in the user perception of the healthcare system, positively impacting service access and overall satisfaction.
Expedited the ownership transfer process for social housing, with 85% of completed homes titled by the end of 2019.
Led the definition of urban venues for the Youth Olympic Games, resulting in the construction of a new Olympic Village.
Budget Execution:
Supervised budget execution across 6 ministries, preventing underutilization and achieving a 6% budgetary efficiency.

Key Competencies:

Financial Reporting
KPI Analysis
Compliance Management
SAP - ERP Expertise
Process Improvement
Financial Statements Oversight



KPI Analysis and Reporting: Spearheaded monthly KPI analysis and reporting to the Financial Control Board, ensuring accurate insights into P&L indicators.
Cross-functional Collaboration: Worked collaboratively with accounting and operations teams to elucidate key factors driving price and cost evolution on a monthly and YTD basis.
GAAP Compliance: As a Senior Analyst, ensured meticulous adherence to local and US GAAP Guidelines in the preparation of financial statements and consolidated balance sheets.
Fixed Assets Management: Took charge of the preparation of the Fixed Assets Report on SAP - ERP, overseeing assets valued at over $3,500 million.
Process Improvement: Achieved a significant accounting process improvement for monthly end tasks, streamlining information flow from Excel to Word.
Operational Oversight: Monitored billing, stock, and production processes, ensuring operational efficiency and accuracy.

I supervised a 3 workers accounting area mainly responsible for:
Accounting reconciliation approval  and journal entries (FI/ SAP)
Month end tasks for Banks and Fix Assets 
Oil production budget analysis and its evolution.
Follow up on the internal and external audit recommendations 
Controlling productive and in process assets over 1,000M ARS (FA/ SAP)
Materials Report: additions, cancellations, revaluations and depreciations in SAP for the 4 storages placed in Tierra del Fuego, Neuquén & Rio Grande. (MM/ SAP)

SAP Asset Management & Material Management
Compliance & Audit responsible.


Merge Sr Analyst  (2015)
During the merge I was responsible for applying IFRS standards for the fixed assets and the adaptation procedures.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina

element.headline: PM 📊 | Controller & Reporting🔎 | Finance & Accounting 📉
element.about:
👩🏽‍💼 Cuento con una Maestría en Dirección de proyectos y una licenciatura en Ciencias Económicas. 
Por más de 10 años me he dedicado a mejorar procesos y procedimientos, para que lograr resultados eficientes. 
Mi capacidad de adaptación y flexibilidad ha quedado demostrada en mi desempeño en reconocidas organizaciones tanto en el ámbito público como en empresas multinacionales.
Me apasiona ❤️ escuchar, estudiar y analizar las metodologías que usan los equipos y creo que ante cada problema existe una posibilidad de mejorar.
He aprendido que para poder lograr resultados se necesitan muchas cosas, principalmente poder medir esos resultados, identificar qué medir, analizar los datos y valores de los indicadores y gestionar el accionar del equipo en pos de lo que queremos lograr.
Soy excelente controller por mi capacidad de análisis, de anticipación a problemas y mi foco puesto en la eficiencia.Además, poseo un nivel bilingüe de inglés, intermedio de francés y portugués. 
Soy geek del Excel y creo que los sistemas de gestión vienen solucionar el trabajo diario. Me declaro fan por aprender tanto del mundo formal como de las personas.  
Creo en el trabajo en equipo, no sólo como delegación de tareas sino como una estrategia para ser eficientes y disfrutar del proceso.

🇪🇸 Me mudé a Valencia para continuar mi desarrollo profesional.

experience.description:
Key Skills: 
Financial Reporting and Analysis
Strategic Planning, budgeting and Forecasting
Cash Flow Management
Consolidation of Accounts
Client and Supplier Operations Management

Main responsibilities: 
Prepare comprehensive periodic, monthly, quarterly, and annual reports to facilitate informed decision-making.

Conduct in-depth financial analysis to inform decision-making, identifying opportunities for cost optimisation and revenue enhancement.

Cultivate and maintain strong relations with banking entities, facilitating loan acquisition and managing contractual agreements.

Contribute to the annual budgeting process across different companies within the group, ensuring alignment with organisational objectives.

Prepare and compile documentation for the consolidation of accounts, ensuring accuracy and compliance with reporting standards.

Efficiently manage the daily operations involving clients and suppliers, ensuring seamless and productive collaborations.

Key Achievements:
Successfully led the redesign of the payment approval process, resulting in streamlined operations and increased efficiency.
Implemented improvements in monthly controlling reports, enhancing financial visibility for the entire group.
Established and maintained a strong internal control framework for AP, AR, taxation, and financial forecasting.

experience.companyName: Gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos aires
experience.description:
🌐 100% Remote Position
Experienced Strategic Operations Manager operating under the guidance and supervision of the esteemed Management and Strategy Division. Known for orchestrating seamless collaboration with key stakeholders across diverse divisions. Proficient in steering global strategies in alignment with organizational goals and overseeing intricate contractual lifecycles, acquisitions, and strategic agreements.

Employ a collaborative and inclusive approach to develop a global strategy aligned with the organization's overarching objectives.

Manage the end-to-end contract lifecycle, including acquisitions and the establishment of strategic or ad hoc agreements, ensuring meticulous adherence to contractual aspects.

Coordinate team activities, ensuring timely and high-quality project delivery. Provide guidance on strategy, plans, policies, and procedures for optimal results.

Design strategic planning frameworks and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for both short and long-term projects.

Ensure correct and accurate project handling, conduct follow-up meetings, and adhere to schedules. Oversee reporting, monitor KPIs, evaluate strategic projects, and administer budgets.

Lead, guide, and mentor team members organization -wide, promoting high professional and ethical standards.

🏆 Achievements:
Successfully led the payment process improvement project in 2021, achieving a remarkable 20% reduction in payment terms.
Instrumental in optimizing operating modes, reviewing and enhancing 67% of administration processes to date.

experience.companyName: Gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos aires
experience.description:
In my role as Director of Operations for the Ministry of Social Development, I orchestrated, designed, and supervised the simultaneous implementation of high-impact projects within a few months. Working collaboratively across five cross-functional teams, my focus was on standardizing, digitizing, and optimizing services for the 3,000,000 residents of the city.

Key Skills:

Project Management
Cross-Functional Collaboration
Process Optimization
Financial Operations
Quality Improvement
Stakeholder Engagement
Reporting and Analysis

Project Highlights:

IT Projects:
Led the implementation of a new enrollment software across 76 educational centers, catering to 60,000 vacancies.
Coordinated a software implementation project to streamline the management and monthly payment process for 15 food providers.

Processes and Procedures:
Developed comprehensive procedure manuals for financial operations spanning five business units.
Achieved budgetary and quality efficiency in the weekly food service order and delivery process for 468 locations.
Generated monthly reports to assess the structural conditions of over 500 different facilities.
Supervised the implementation of a subsidy payment administration system, achieving an 80% reduction in paper documentation volume.

Social Impact Evaluation:
Led the impact evaluation of social programs, partnering with UNICEF, for programs with a budget exceeding 3.8 billion. This resulted in the initiation of improvement processes, with leadership roles in two of them.

Project Authorization and Collaboration:
Drafted Technical Reference Documents (TRD) for the authorization of the "One Victory Leads to Another" project in collaboration with UN Women.

experience.companyName: Gobierno de la Ciudad de Buenos aires
experience.description:
As a seasoned Senior Accountant, I bring a wealth of experience and a results-driven mindset to financial management. Proficient in handling complex financial transactions, optimizing budget execution, and ensuring regulatory compliance.  My strategic oversight enabled timely corrections, key decision-making, and successful project completion within approved timelines and budgets.


 Key Competencies:
Strategic Planning
Project Management
KPI Monitoring
Continuous Process Improvement
Budget Execution
Team Leadership

Strategic Planning:
Developed and executed the four-year strategic government plan (2016-2019) by selecting projects from various areas.
Identified project opportunities that formed the foundation for the 2019 Government Commitments Campaign.
Management Control:
Monitored KPIs for 30+ priority projects with social, urban development, and legal-banking impact.
Implemented continuous process improvement methodologies and coordinated cross-functional projects.
Achieved a 35% improvement in the user perception of the healthcare system, positively impacting service access and overall satisfaction.
Expedited the ownership transfer process for social housing, with 85% of completed homes titled by the end of 2019.
Led the definition of urban venues for the Youth Olympic Games, resulting in the construction of a new Olympic Village.
Budget Execution:
Supervised budget execution across 6 ministries, preventing underutilization and achieving a 6% budgetary efficiency.

Key Competencies:

Financial Reporting
KPI Analysis
Compliance Management
SAP - ERP Expertise
Process Improvement
Financial Statements Oversight



KPI Analysis and Reporting: Spearheaded monthly KPI analysis and reporting to the Financial Control Board, ensuring accurate insights into P&L indicators.
Cross-functional Collaboration: Worked collaboratively with accounting and operations teams to elucidate key factors driving price and cost evolution on a monthly and YTD basis.
GAAP Compliance: As a Senior Analyst, ensured meticulous adherence to local and US GAAP Guidelines in the preparation of financial statements and consolidated balance sheets.
Fixed Assets Management: Took charge of the preparation of the Fixed Assets Report on SAP - ERP, overseeing assets valued at over $3,500 million.
Process Improvement: Achieved a significant accounting process improvement for monthly end tasks, streamlining information flow from Excel to Word.
Operational Oversight: Monitored billing, stock, and production processes, ensuring operational efficiency and accuracy.

I supervised a 3 workers accounting area mainly responsible for:
Accounting reconciliation approval  and journal entries (FI/ SAP)
Month end tasks for Banks and Fix Assets 
Oil production budget analysis and its evolution.
Follow up on the internal and external audit recommendations 
Controlling productive and in process assets over 1,000M ARS (FA/ SAP)
Materials Report: additions, cancellations, revaluations and depreciations in SAP for the 4 storages placed in Tierra del Fuego, Neuquén & Rio Grande. (MM/ SAP)

SAP Asset Management & Material Management
Compliance & Audit responsible.


Merge Sr Analyst  (2015)
During the merge I was responsible for applying IFRS standards for the fixed assets and the adaptation procedures.

headline: Técnico de Nóminas | RRHH Generalista | Asistente Funcional Odoo | Data Entry Odoo: Nóminas, Ventas, Compras, Inventario, Proyectos | Licenciado en Dirección de Empresas
about:
Profesional con más de 15 años de experiencia como responsable de áreas laborales y de nóminas.
Experiencia en Odoo, desempeñando tareas de data entry, mesa de tickets y soporte funcional. Participación en proyecto de localización de Nómina española en Odoo, contribuyendo en la interpretación normativa, diseño funcional, configuración y validación de reglas salariales.
topSkills: Trabajo en equipo • Dirección de equipos • Recursos humanos (RR. HH.) • Gestión de nóminas • Odoo

experience.position: Analista de datos / Asistente Funcional - Odoo
experience.description:
Participación en proyectos de implementación de Odoo junto a los Project Managers, colaborando en la carga masiva de datos: contactos, productos, variantes (atributos, valores, referencias), imágenes, categorías, ajustes de impuestos, posiciones fiscales y oportunidades en CRM.
Participación activa como asesor funcional y técnico-laboral en el proyecto de localización de la nómina española en Odoo, colaborando en:
• Interpretación de normativa laboral española y su adaptación funcional.
• Diseño de estructuras salariales, tipos de contrato y calendarios laborales.
• Configuración, testeo y validación de reglas salariales (IRPF, cotizaciones, finiquitos).
• Coordinación con el equipo técnico para la correcta implementación del módulo.
• Elaboración de documentación funcional y soporte interno.
Gestión operativa de la mesa de ayuda: recepción de todos los tickets internos, asignación a los equipos correspondientes y resolución directa de incidencias menores.
Manejo de módulos funcionales de Odoo: Compras, Ventas, Inventario y Proyectos.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Responsable de la elaboración mensual de nóminas, incluyendo bases de cotización, IRPF, complementos, pagas extras, vacaciones y finiquitos, según normativa laboral española.
Gestión de altas, bajas y variaciones contractuales en la Seguridad Social.
Presentación de modelos fiscales 111 y 190.
Manejo operativo de las plataformas: SILTRA, Sistema RED, Contrat@, Delt@, SEPE y CASIA.
Coordinación con asesoría externa para la gestión de documentación laboral.
Atención a consultas del personal y soporte administrativo en procesos laborales internos.

Nexo funcional entre la empresa cliente y el equipo implementador de Odoo en el proyecto de migración desde eBay.
Configuración inicial del entorno: tarifas, categorías, atributos y variantes de productos para venta online.
Apoyo en el diseño de la web de ecommerce en Odoo Website.
Supervisión de la integración vía API con eBay, controlando referencias, stock y listados.
Seguimiento de la consistencia de datos, validación de reglas de negocio y coordinación entre áreas técnicas y comerciales.

experience.position: Responsable de Recursos Humanos y Coordinador Operativo
experience.description:
Representación operativa de la empresa en ausencia del gerente, actuando como máxima autoridad presencial en la planta.
Coordinación general de las áreas de mantenimiento, tráfico, administración y contabilidad.
Supervisión del equipo de Recursos Humanos y control del proceso de nóminas, contrataciones y gestión documental laboral.
Comunicación legal con estudio jurídico externo: identificación y planteamiento de conflictos, propuesta de acciones a seguir y ejecución de las resoluciones acordadas por el directorio.
Interlocutor directo con el sindicato, acudiendo de forma periódica a reuniones gremiales representando a la empresa, atendiendo reclamos y negociaciones con delegados.
Organización de equipos de trabajo, planificación operativa y mejora de la comunicación interna entre sectores.

Gestión integral del área de Recursos Humanos: contrataciones, relaciones laborales, sanciones, bajas, despidos y documentación legal.
Participación activa en el proceso de nóminas, incluyendo control de novedades, liquidación, aplicación de convenios y ajustes mensuales, apoyado por personal auxiliar en tareas operativas (control de asistencias, ausencias, etc.).
Responsable del contacto directo con abogados laborales: identificación de conflictos, análisis de escenarios, propuesta de acciones y ejecución de decisiones tomadas por la dirección.
Apoyo en procesos de selección y planificación del personal de mantenimiento.
Parametrización y validación del sistema ERP para la gestión de datos de RRHH.
Encargado de tareas operativas adicionales: entrega y control de viáticos en efectivo, arqueos de caja, rendición de valores y control de gastos del área.
Búsqueda personal directa, entrevistas,  seguimiento

Control horario de toda la planta (conductores, mantenimiento y administración) y carga de datos al sistema de sueldos (sin liquidación directa).
Registro manual de vueltas de conductores para el cálculo de horas, determinación de extras y horas no oficiales, solicitud y pago en efectivo de estas últimas.
Gestión y denuncia de accidentes de trabajo, seguimiento de partes y comunicación con organismos.
Diagramación mensual del personal de mantenimiento, organización de turnos y mejoras en ciclos de trabajo.
Entrega de recibos de sueldo, documentación laboral y tareas administrativas de soporte en RRHH.

Atención al cliente, cobro en caja y resolución de incidencias en línea de cajas.

headline: Engineering Manager+ | Software Engineer  | Solopreneur | E-Commerce
about:
I’m a software engineer with deep expertise in TypeScript, Node.js, and MongoDB, dedicated to building high-performance, cloud-native systems that power complex e-commerce ecosystems. Over the years, I’ve designed and delivered enterprise-grade architectures capable of handling millions of transactions, sub-100ms response times, and dynamic business logic across payments, promotions, tax, shipping, and inventory domains.

My work revolves around microservices architecture, domain-driven design, event sourcing, and CQRS—engineering principles that ensure scalability, reliability, and maintainability in production at scale. I’m passionate about elegant, type-safe code and precision in system design, from AI-driven APIs to multi-tier caching layers and CI/CD pipelines built for velocity and confidence.

Recent highlights include:

• Architected a cloud-native e-commerce platform using NestJS, TypeScript, MongoDB, Redis, and Kubernetes.
• Engineered advanced systems for payment orchestration (Stripe, Braintree, custom vouchers) and intelligent promotions/tax logic.
• Designed real-time event processing pipelines achieving sub-100ms performance.
• Integrated analytics and AI-powered APIs to drive data-informed business operations.

Beyond code, my focus is on technical clarity and architectural impact—creating platforms that are not just functional, but enduring. My goal is to bridge deep technical craftsmanship with real - world business scalability, turning complex e-commerce requirements into resilient, high - performance systems.

experience.position: Lead Software Developer | Enterprise E-Commerce Platform
experience.description:
Led the end-to-end design and implementation of a cloud-native enterprise e-commerce platform, owning architecture and development of a scalable microservices ecosystem with advanced payments, promotions, tax, shipping, pricing, inventory, and real-time event processing.
Took full technical ownership as Lead Developer, architecting and delivering a production-ready platform built with NestJS, TypeScript, MongoDB, Redis, and Kubernetes. Designed the entire microservices ecosystem while ensuring enterprise-grade scalability, resilience, and performance.
 
Key Contributions & Achievements:
• Performance at Scale - Reduced database load through multi-tier caching and query optimization, enabling real-time cart operations and sub-100ms operations, including promotion calculations.
• End-to-End Ownership – Architected and delivered the complete microservices ecosystem (cart, payments, promotions, shipping, tax, inventory, pricing), ensuring scalability and maintainability for enterprise-level e-commerce operations.
• Resilient Transactions – Designed a fault-tolerant payments system integrating Stripe, Braintree, and voucher processing, with built-in failure recovery, refunds, and multi-processor splitting.
• Intelligent Business Logic – Built a configurable promotions engine, real-time tax/shipping calculations, and complex cart flows with multi-currency support, supporting diverse business models.
• Enterprise-Grade Engineering Practices – Enforced strict type safety, functional error handling, automated CI/CD pipelines, and comprehensive testing with Jest for long-term maintainability.
• AI Agent - Build AI capabilities to expose API and Data Analytics.

Demonstrated expertise in building production-ready, cloud-native microservices systems, applying domain-driven design, event sourcing, and CQRS to deliver a scalable, maintainable enterprise e-commerce solution.

• Tech Entrepreneurship at KiboRoutes (https://kiboroutes.com)
• Software Developer at LogicPlaces (https://logicplaces.com)
• E-commerce Software Architect and Tech Lead at a start-up company.

Led the “Experience and Extensibility” group, with 6 development teams composed of 35 team members, including Engineering Managers, Software Developers and Staff Engineers.
• Cascade the company's leadership strategy to teams during a period of exponential growth, ensuring alignment with organizational goals while maintaining team cohesion and engagement.
• Mentored Engineering Managers and Staff Engineers, building leadership capacity to support expanding team structures and business objectives.
• Championed a culture of excellence by driving best practices in software development, architecture, and operational processes.
• Ensured cross-functional collaboration with Product, Design, and other stakeholders to deliver innovative features aligned with customer needs.
• Enhanced team productivity and motivation through goal-setting, performance management, and continuous feedback, enabling high-impact delivery in a fast-paced environment.
• Played a key role in scaling the engineering organization, optimizing team structures, and hiring top-tier talent.

I also set up the Valencia Office as the company's second development center.

Build a high-performance multinational team and set the company's engineering culture.

Talent

• Manage and grow the team focusing on their development and growth so that everyone can make their greatest impact while thriving on their day-to-day job, feeling motivated and proud to achieve their goals.
• Improve the team capabilities by implementing a consistent method.
• Coach Team Leads and Engineering Managers in the team.
• Actively participate in the hiring process, ensuring that only the best talent (attitude + tech skills) join the team.
• Co-create a fair and sustainable talent assessment method.
• Master the application of evaluation criteria and career planning for engineers and managers addressing a healthy mix of technical and leadership skills.
• Participate in pre and post-sales activities.

Strategy

• Deliver a revised architectural roadmap within the owned services that unlocks future product value, addresses mid-term scale risks, and improves our security.

Quality/Best practices

• Constantly identify improvement opportunities and implement them.
• Deploy engineering best practices to ensure top quality output and minimum technical debt, while improving predictability and pace of delivery.
• Set KPI’s amongst staff to advance the centre of excellence and best practices within software engineering.
• Leading and championing Agile/SAFe development methods

Leadership

• Strive for the team and individual engagement through ambitious goal-setting and performance management 
• Lead key engineering department initiatives.
• Manage and operate with third-party technology providers, like software licences, service accounts, training providers, etc.

Designed and developed the Capgemini’s Valencia J2EE framework, boosting project productivity ratio by a factor of 2. The framework is now used in house and offshore by 100+ developers in a €3M size projects.

Continually research for technologies and industry best-practices to enhance company practices.
Globally recognized deep and broad technical knowledge in software architecture, design, analysis and programming.
Designed J2EE architecture for several public and private customers, unifying the teams with common practices and tools.

Examples of use include, but not limited to, managing distributed teams, facilitating access to knowledge, sharing ideas or presenting innovations to improve enterprise performance, etc.

projects.title: Bookworld Australia
projects.description:
The Customer
Bookworld is Australia’s leading online bookstore, with over half a million existing customers.

The Challenges
The Bookworld corporation owns two large companies operating two distinct ecommerce websites running on different platforms. This has resulted in increased maintenance effort, complexity and cost. Bookworld required their two legacy websites to be replaced with a more adaptable ecommerce platform providing a multi-channel, multi-site solution.

The Solution
We worked with the client to design and develop a solution based on the Hybris multi-channel platform. A multi-site ecommerce system that enables two different sites to operate on the same platform, using the same infrastructure. 
The core team developed a Hybris Data Model, implemented core services and customized several Hybris out-of-the-box functions. 
The UI and CS cockpit team developed storefront features and functions for system administrators.

The Results 
Bookworld customers now have a unified user experience with the Hybris implementation including online bookstore. As both sites are now running on the same platform, support staff now have reduced complexity and reduced issues, resulting in lower cost of ownership. The Hybris multi-channel platform has also allowed Bookworld to adapt to the fast pace of ecommerce while enabling future

Tuve la oportunidad de trabajar con Nico bajo su supervisión.  Es de esos profesionales que contagian su pasión por la profesión: excelentes aptitudes como mentor, manager y un vasto conocimiento técnico que inspiran a las personas que trabajan con él. 

I had the opportunity to work with Nico under his supervision. He is one of those professionals who spread his passion for the profession: excellent skills as a mentor, manager and a vast technical knowledge that inspire the people who work with him.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Chief Sales & Portfolio Officer - Executive Vice President - Capgemini Spain
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 8, 2013, David managed Nicolás directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Nicolás Cornaglia is an experienced and passionate senior software engineer, with a broad and complete vision of the Java technology, including a lot of solutions, frameworks and libraries of the market; and also software development methodologies.
During the period we worked together he always showed a high technical leadership and a continuous seek and ambition for continuous improvement, continuous learning and excellent quality.
He developed many key components and assets to boost productivity and was always a source of knowledge and technical inspiration for the team.
I strongly recommend Nicolás as one of the best software engineers I 've met.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Vice President | Managing Director Insights & Data Spain
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 6, 2013, Manuel managed Nicolás directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
El Sr. Nicolás Cornaglia se incorporó en Febrero de 2005 a Capgemini, y durante el periodo que ha permanecido en la empresa ha desarrollado un excepcional trabajo como arquitecto software J2EE, dando siempre un valor diferencial en los múltiples proyectos de carácter estratégico en los que ha participado.
Desde su primer año en Capgemini el Sr. Cornaglia ha destacado como un experto J2EE, donde año tras año ha ido creciendo hasta confirmarse como un 'guru tecnológico'.
Su visión experta y futurista, sumada a sus inquietudes tecnológicas personales, hacen que siempre sepa hacia donde avanzar. Tanto a nivel de proyecto, como a nivel de compañía, el Sr. Cornaglia siempre ha sabido marcar el roadmap adecuado para garantizar la viabilidad, calidad y evolución de todo aquello en lo que ha participado. 
Mentor y líder tecnológico, siempre ha enriquecido a todos los equipos de trabajo con los que ha colaborado sabiéndoles guiar por el camino correcto. El Sr. Cornaglia ha sido una referencia para todas aquellas personas que le han acompañado en su andadura dentro de Capgemini.
Su incesante búsqueda de la mejora continua, llegando a acariciar la excelencia, le ha permitido impulsar un nuevo modelo de desarrollo de software dentro de Capgemini, denominado ‘Desarrollo 3.0’. Modelo en el cual ha colaborado aportando activos de gran valor, de entre los que destaca el framework de aplicaciones Devon.
Fruto de su trabajo en Devon, y gracias al apoyo y aportación de un equipo experto en desarrollo de software a medida, Capgemini ha apostado por el modelo de ‘Desarrollo 3.0’ implantando en Valencia el Centro de Excelencia Java/Devon.
El Sr. Cornaglia ofrece un valor diferencial para cualquier compañía, difícil de encontrar ya no solo dentro de compañías de la envergadura de Capgemini, sino en todo el sector IT.
Ha sido un honor y un privilegio poder trabajar junto con el Sr. Cornaglia, por ello me enorgullece recomendarle sin reserva alguna.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Engineering Manager at ClassDojo

receivedRecommendations.description: Nicolás es un excelente profesional, con grandes conocimientos en técnologias JEE y muy buenas habilidades de comunicación. Trabajar junto a el fue una muy buena experiencia, la cual me gustaria que se repita en un futuro.

element.headline: Engineering Manager+ | Software Engineer  | Solopreneur | E-Commerce
element.about:
I’m a software engineer with deep expertise in TypeScript, Node.js, and MongoDB, dedicated to building high-performance, cloud-native systems that power complex e-commerce ecosystems. Over the years, I’ve designed and delivered enterprise-grade architectures capable of handling millions of transactions, sub-100ms response times, and dynamic business logic across payments, promotions, tax, shipping, and inventory domains.

My work revolves around microservices architecture, domain-driven design, event sourcing, and CQRS—engineering principles that ensure scalability, reliability, and maintainability in production at scale. I’m passionate about elegant, type-safe code and precision in system design, from AI-driven APIs to multi-tier caching layers and CI/CD pipelines built for velocity and confidence.

Recent highlights include:

• Architected a cloud-native e-commerce platform using NestJS, TypeScript, MongoDB, Redis, and Kubernetes.
• Engineered advanced systems for payment orchestration (Stripe, Braintree, custom vouchers) and intelligent promotions/tax logic.
• Designed real-time event processing pipelines achieving sub-100ms performance.
• Integrated analytics and AI-powered APIs to drive data-informed business operations.

Beyond code, my focus is on technical clarity and architectural impact—creating platforms that are not just functional, but enduring. My goal is to bridge deep technical craftsmanship with real - world business scalability, turning complex e-commerce requirements into resilient, high - performance systems.

experience.position: Lead Software Developer | Enterprise E-Commerce Platform
experience.description:
Led the end-to-end design and implementation of a cloud-native enterprise e-commerce platform, owning architecture and development of a scalable microservices ecosystem with advanced payments, promotions, tax, shipping, pricing, inventory, and real-time event processing.
Took full technical ownership as Lead Developer, architecting and delivering a production-ready platform built with NestJS, TypeScript, MongoDB, Redis, and Kubernetes. Designed the entire microservices ecosystem while ensuring enterprise-grade scalability, resilience, and performance.
 
Key Contributions & Achievements:
• Performance at Scale - Reduced database load through multi-tier caching and query optimization, enabling real-time cart operations and sub-100ms operations, including promotion calculations.
• End-to-End Ownership – Architected and delivered the complete microservices ecosystem (cart, payments, promotions, shipping, tax, inventory, pricing), ensuring scalability and maintainability for enterprise-level e-commerce operations.
• Resilient Transactions – Designed a fault-tolerant payments system integrating Stripe, Braintree, and voucher processing, with built-in failure recovery, refunds, and multi-processor splitting.
• Intelligent Business Logic – Built a configurable promotions engine, real-time tax/shipping calculations, and complex cart flows with multi-currency support, supporting diverse business models.
• Enterprise-Grade Engineering Practices – Enforced strict type safety, functional error handling, automated CI/CD pipelines, and comprehensive testing with Jest for long-term maintainability.
• AI Agent - Build AI capabilities to expose API and Data Analytics.

Demonstrated expertise in building production-ready, cloud-native microservices systems, applying domain-driven design, event sourcing, and CQRS to deliver a scalable, maintainable enterprise e-commerce solution.

• Tech Entrepreneurship at KiboRoutes (https://kiboroutes.com)
• Software Developer at LogicPlaces (https://logicplaces.com)
• E-commerce Software Architect and Tech Lead at a start-up company.

Led the “Experience and Extensibility” group, with 6 development teams composed of 35 team members, including Engineering Managers, Software Developers and Staff Engineers.
• Cascade the company's leadership strategy to teams during a period of exponential growth, ensuring alignment with organizational goals while maintaining team cohesion and engagement.
• Mentored Engineering Managers and Staff Engineers, building leadership capacity to support expanding team structures and business objectives.
• Championed a culture of excellence by driving best practices in software development, architecture, and operational processes.
• Ensured cross-functional collaboration with Product, Design, and other stakeholders to deliver innovative features aligned with customer needs.
• Enhanced team productivity and motivation through goal-setting, performance management, and continuous feedback, enabling high-impact delivery in a fast-paced environment.
• Played a key role in scaling the engineering organization, optimizing team structures, and hiring top-tier talent.

I also set up the Valencia Office as the company's second development center.

Build a high-performance multinational team and set the company's engineering culture.

Talent

• Manage and grow the team focusing on their development and growth so that everyone can make their greatest impact while thriving on their day-to-day job, feeling motivated and proud to achieve their goals.
• Improve the team capabilities by implementing a consistent method.
• Coach Team Leads and Engineering Managers in the team.
• Actively participate in the hiring process, ensuring that only the best talent (attitude + tech skills) join the team.
• Co-create a fair and sustainable talent assessment method.
• Master the application of evaluation criteria and career planning for engineers and managers addressing a healthy mix of technical and leadership skills.
• Participate in pre and post-sales activities.

Strategy

• Deliver a revised architectural roadmap within the owned services that unlocks future product value, addresses mid-term scale risks, and improves our security.

Quality/Best practices

• Constantly identify improvement opportunities and implement them.
• Deploy engineering best practices to ensure top quality output and minimum technical debt, while improving predictability and pace of delivery.
• Set KPI’s amongst staff to advance the centre of excellence and best practices within software engineering.
• Leading and championing Agile/SAFe development methods

Leadership

• Strive for the team and individual engagement through ambitious goal-setting and performance management 
• Lead key engineering department initiatives.
• Manage and operate with third-party technology providers, like software licences, service accounts, training providers, etc.

projects.title: Bookworld Australia
projects.description:
The Customer
Bookworld is Australia’s leading online bookstore, with over half a million existing customers.

The Challenges
The Bookworld corporation owns two large companies operating two distinct ecommerce websites running on different platforms. This has resulted in increased maintenance effort, complexity and cost. Bookworld required their two legacy websites to be replaced with a more adaptable ecommerce platform providing a multi-channel, multi-site solution.

The Solution
We worked with the client to design and develop a solution based on the Hybris multi-channel platform. A multi-site ecommerce system that enables two different sites to operate on the same platform, using the same infrastructure. 
The core team developed a Hybris Data Model, implemented core services and customized several Hybris out-of-the-box functions. 
The UI and CS cockpit team developed storefront features and functions for system administrators.

The Results 
Bookworld customers now have a unified user experience with the Hybris implementation including online bookstore. As both sites are now running on the same platform, support staff now have reduced complexity and reduced issues, resulting in lower cost of ownership. The Hybris multi-channel platform has also allowed Bookworld to adapt to the fast pace of ecommerce while enabling future

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Chief Sales & Portfolio Officer - Executive Vice President - Capgemini Spain
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 8, 2013, David managed Nicolás directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Nicolás Cornaglia is an experienced and passionate senior software engineer, with a broad and complete vision of the Java technology, including a lot of solutions, frameworks and libraries of the market; and also software development methodologies.
During the period we worked together he always showed a high technical leadership and a continuous seek and ambition for continuous improvement, continuous learning and excellent quality.
He developed many key components and assets to boost productivity and was always a source of knowledge and technical inspiration for the team.
I strongly recommend Nicolás as one of the best software engineers I 've met.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Vice President | Managing Director Insights & Data Spain
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 6, 2013, Manuel managed Nicolás directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
El Sr. Nicolás Cornaglia se incorporó en Febrero de 2005 a Capgemini, y durante el periodo que ha permanecido en la empresa ha desarrollado un excepcional trabajo como arquitecto software J2EE, dando siempre un valor diferencial en los múltiples proyectos de carácter estratégico en los que ha participado.
Desde su primer año en Capgemini el Sr. Cornaglia ha destacado como un experto J2EE, donde año tras año ha ido creciendo hasta confirmarse como un 'guru tecnológico'.
Su visión experta y futurista, sumada a sus inquietudes tecnológicas personales, hacen que siempre sepa hacia donde avanzar. Tanto a nivel de proyecto, como a nivel de compañía, el Sr. Cornaglia siempre ha sabido marcar el roadmap adecuado para garantizar la viabilidad, calidad y evolución de todo aquello en lo que ha participado. 
Mentor y líder tecnológico, siempre ha enriquecido a todos los equipos de trabajo con los que ha colaborado sabiéndoles guiar por el camino correcto. El Sr. Cornaglia ha sido una referencia para todas aquellas personas que le han acompañado en su andadura dentro de Capgemini.
Su incesante búsqueda de la mejora continua, llegando a acariciar la excelencia, le ha permitido impulsar un nuevo modelo de desarrollo de software dentro de Capgemini, denominado ‘Desarrollo 3.0’. Modelo en el cual ha colaborado aportando activos de gran valor, de entre los que destaca el framework de aplicaciones Devon.
Fruto de su trabajo en Devon, y gracias al apoyo y aportación de un equipo experto en desarrollo de software a medida, Capgemini ha apostado por el modelo de ‘Desarrollo 3.0’ implantando en Valencia el Centro de Excelencia Java/Devon.
El Sr. Cornaglia ofrece un valor diferencial para cualquier compañía, difícil de encontrar ya no solo dentro de compañías de la envergadura de Capgemini, sino en todo el sector IT.
Ha sido un honor y un privilegio poder trabajar junto con el Sr. Cornaglia, por ello me enorgullece recomendarle sin reserva alguna.

about:
I'm Salo! I work connecting with people to make things happen and I find that magical.

We live in a changing world so, to have a 360º comprehensive view, I focus on learning new soft skills & hard skills.

I'm an advanced student of Psychology in UDIMA. I have 5 years of recruiting experience in different industries: Food Industries, manufacturing, Services, etc. But as I like challenges, I decided to get to know and work in new industries, such as IT.

I currently work as a Freelance Recruiter, but my dream is to be able to work in a big IT company, contributing to team goals and involving everyone in the same direction.

I am a mother, a wife and a dynamic entrepreneur who seeks to materialize her dreams.

I am also athlete Bikini Fitness Senior to IFBB Academy. I consider sport as the engine of my motivation and psychological well-being.

element.about:
I'm Salo! I work connecting with people to make things happen and I find that magical.

We live in a changing world so, to have a 360º comprehensive view, I focus on learning new soft skills & hard skills.

I'm an advanced student of Psychology in UDIMA. I have 5 years of recruiting experience in different industries: Food Industries, manufacturing, Services, etc. But as I like challenges, I decided to get to know and work in new industries, such as IT.

I currently work as a Freelance Recruiter, but my dream is to be able to work in a big IT company, contributing to team goals and involving everyone in the same direction.

I am a mother, a wife and a dynamic entrepreneur who seeks to materialize her dreams.

I am also athlete Bikini Fitness Senior to IFBB Academy. I consider sport as the engine of my motivation and psychological well-being.
🇳🇮-🇮🇹

headline: Gerente Responsable de C&I y Marketing

experience.description:
Responsable de Clientes e Industrias en Deloitte Zona Este 
- apoyo a la dirección en el seguimiento comercial y desarrollo de negocio.
- preparación de informes y presentaciones para los diferentes comité ejecutivos.

Responsable de Marketing en Deloitte Zona Este
- coordinación, desarrollo y seguimiento de las iniciativas estratégicas del plan de marketing establecido.
- seguimiento presupuestario del mismo.

Responsabilidades en el área de Clientes y Mercados:
- Gestionar del CRM de la firma en el área de Levante.
- Potenciar y optimizar el uso de metodologías y herramientas internas.
- Dar soporte en la elaboración de propuestas estratégicas.
- Colaborar en el desarrollo de los materiales de formación.
- Realizar el seguimiento de las acciones comerciales definidas desde la industria y líneas de servicio.

Responsabilidades en el área de Marketing:
- Establecer las líneas generales del Plan de Marketing del área de Levante.
- Realizar seguimiento periódico de las iniciativas programadas. 
- Analizar los objetivos alcanzados por las acciones realizadas.
- Realizar la evaluación global de los resultados y proponer acciones de mejora de cara al siguiente plan.
- Coordinar la comunicación interna.
- Coordinación de la distribución de publicaciones de la Firma en Levante

Adicionalmente:
  Gestionar y coordinar los eventos del área de Levante.
  Poner en marcha las iniciativas de fidelización del cliente.
  Coordinar el colectivo Alumni en Valencia.

- apoyo a la dirección en el seguimiento comercial y desarrollo de negocio.
- preparación de informes y presentaciones para los diferentes comité ejecutivos.

Responsable de Marketing en Deloitte Zona Este
- coordinación, desarrollo y seguimiento de las iniciativas estratégicas del plan de marketing establecido.
- seguimiento presupuestario del mismo.

Responsabilidades en el área de Clientes y Mercados:
- Gestionar del CRM de la firma en el área de Levante.
- Potenciar y optimizar el uso de metodologías y herramientas internas.
- Dar soporte en la elaboración de propuestas estratégicas.
- Colaborar en el desarrollo de los materiales de formación.
- Realizar el seguimiento de las acciones comerciales definidas desde la industria y líneas de servicio.

Responsabilidades en el área de Marketing:
- Establecer las líneas generales del Plan de Marketing del área de Levante.
- Realizar seguimiento periódico de las iniciativas programadas. 
- Analizar los objetivos alcanzados por las acciones realizadas.
- Realizar la evaluación global de los resultados y proponer acciones de mejora de cara al siguiente plan.
- Coordinar la comunicación interna.
- Coordinación de la distribución de publicaciones de la Firma en Levante

Adicionalmente:
  Gestionar y coordinar los eventos del área de Levante.
  Poner en marcha las iniciativas de fidelización del cliente.
  Coordinar el colectivo Alumni en Valencia.

headline: Psicóloga General Sanitaria (CV 19406)
about:
Soy psicóloga clínica apasionada por acompañar a las personas en sus procesos de cambio y crecimiento. Mi enfoque integra las terapias de Tercera Generación (DBT y ACT) con una mirada comprensiva del ser humano, trabajando principalmente con adultos y expandiendo mi práctica hacia niños y adolescentes.

Mi camino profesional se ha enriquecido al combinar la práctica clínica con la docencia universitaria. Esto me ha permitido no solo crecer como terapeuta, sino también contribuir a la formación de futuros profesionales y participar en investigaciones sobre el cambio comportamental, manteniendo siempre presente que detrás de cada teoría hay una historia humana única.

Actualmente desde Valencia, España, donde continúo expandiendo mi práctica clínica y ampliando mi formación. Creo en la psicología como espacio de encuentro con nosotros mismos y en el espacio terapéutico como lugar seguro para el cambio.

experience.description: Psicoterapia individual para adultos desde una perspectiva integrativa

Formo parte del equipo de Growth as a Service.

Participo en la creación de mensajes en secuencias de social selling.

headline: Arquitecta e Interiorista |
about: Arquitecta e Interiorista, con experiencia en reformas, obra nueva e interiorismo, donde combino habilidades técnicas con creatividad para lograr espacios funcionales y estéticos.
topSkills: Arquitectura de interiores • Ampliación de vivienda • Diseño de mobiliario • Renderista • Arquitectura

experience.description: Desde 2019, antes de graduarme en la Universidad Nacional de Rosario, comencé a trabajar de forma independiente en proyectos de Arquitectura. En agosto de 2023, abrí mi propio perfil de Instagram como Arquitecta (@arq.ursulacorti). Desde entonces, me he dedicado de manera independiente a proyectos de interiorismo, reformas y ampliaciones de viviendas, y actualmente estoy llevando a cabo la construcción de un quincho. Aunque disfruto cada aspecto de mis proyectos, tengo una especial pasión por el interiorismo y el diseño de muebles. Me encanta crear espacios que reflejen la personalidad y las necesidades de mis clientes, y diseñar mobiliario único que complemente perfectamente el ambiente. Además, me gusta estar involucrada en todos los detalles del proceso, desde la concepción inicial hasta la ejecución final, asegurándome de que cada aspecto del proyecto esté cuidadosamente elaborado y satisfaga las expectativas de mis clientes.

Trabajaba en una oficina de arquitectura donde se dedicaban a proyectos de reformas, rehabilitación e interiorismo. También diseñaban mobiliario a medida. Tenía manejo de Autocad. Además, modelaba el proyecto completo en 3D utilizando Sketch Up. Utilizaba algunas bibliotecas para la decoración de la Imágen, pero la mayoría de los muebles y luminarias los diseñaba yo utilizando técnicas que fui desarrollando en el programa. Una vez modelado, generaba distintas escenas del proyecto y las renderizaba con V-ray. También empleaba Excel para para realizar planilla de terminaciones o presupuestos.
Jefa de obra en Edificio Sabik | Etapas de Submuración + Vigas de fundación y Cabezales + Losa Casetonada s/ Subsuelo
Dibujante de Autocad para Legajos de Arquitectura + Mobiliarios | Imágenes 3D en SketchUp + V-ray
